item.title: Wallpaper Pack 48: Quartz Drift Glow
item.description: A clean, minimalist wallpaper pack blending slate gray, silver, and pale stone tones into a balanced radial gradient.

item.title: Wallpaper Pack 49: Quartz Drift Levels
item.description: A minimalist wallpaper pack layering slate, silver, and pale stone tones into calm horizontal gradients.

item.title: Wallpaper Pack 55: Linen Arc Levels
item.description: A neutral wallpaper pack layering soft white and beige tones into calm horizontal gradients.

item.title: Wallpaper Pack 76: Vapor Trace Glow

item.title: Wallpaper Pack 77: Vapor Trace Levels
item.description: A neutral wallpaper pack layering charcoal, violet-gray, and mint tones into soft horizontal gradients.
